desaddvideobutton.description: Show the add button from this YouTube video.
desaddvideobutton.message: Show the add button from this YouTube video.

desalllightsoff.description: Clicking the lamp button will toggle the lights on/off on all open tabs when this option is enabled.
desalllightsoff.message: Clicking the lamp button will toggle the lights on/off on all open tabs when this option is enabled.

desambilight.description: Show you the atmosphere lighting effect of the current playing video.
desambilight.message: Zobrazit ambilight efekt kolem právě přehrávaného videa.

desambilightrangeblurradius.description: If set a lower value the shadow will be sharp, the higher the number, the more blurred it will be.
desambilightrangeblurradius.message: Jestliže je nastaveno na nižší hodnoty, stín bude ostrý. Čím vyšší hodnota, tím více rozostřený bude stín.

desambilightrangespreadradius.description: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.
desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Kladné hodnoty zvětší intenzitu stínu, záporné ji sníží.

desambilightvarcolor.description: Take the color from the video.

desatmosphereonly.description: Use the atmosphere lighting feature only the following video site:
desatmosphereonly.message: Use the atmosphere lighting feature only the following video site:

desautoplay.description: Automatically dim the background when you click the play button and versus.
desautoplay.message: Automaticky ztmavit pozadí po kliknutí na tlačítko play a opačně.

desautoplayonly.description: Dim only the following video site(s):
desautoplayonly.message: Dim only the following video site(s):

descontextmenus.description: Show the context menu to focus an item.
descontextmenus.message: Zobrazit kontextové menu k zaměření položky.

description.description: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.
description.message: Celá stránka se zahalí do černého a vy tak můžete sledovat video, jako byste byli v kině.

desenterpassword.description: Enter your password in the box below:
desenterpassword.message: Enter your password in the box below:

deseyea.description: Automatically dim the background when opening a page.
deseyea.message: Automaticky ztmavit pozadí při otevření stránky.

deseyealist.description: Automatically dim the background when opening the following page(s):
deseyealist.message: Automatically dim the background when opening the following page(s):

deseyen.description: Normal use (lights go out when you click on the lamp icon).
deseyen.message: Běžné používání (světla zhasnou, když kliknete na ikonu lampy).

deseyetimesaver.description: When a page is inactive (no mouse or keyboard input) for the time specified below, the page will automatically go dark.
deseyetimesaver.message: When a page is inactive (no mouse or keyboard input) for the time specified below, the page will automatically go dark.

deshardflash.description: Show all Flash objects, skipping the URL filter. This will fix problems with some video players being hidden, but will also display ads.
deshardflash.message: Show all Flash objects, skipping the URL filter. This will fix problems with some video players being hidden, but will also display ads.

deshead.description: Show the YouTube Channel bar or the name.
deshead.message: Zobrazit YouTube Channel bar nebo jméno.

desinfobar.description: Show the description information about the video.

deslikebar.description: Show the like/dislike bar under YouTube videos.
deslikebar.message: Show the like/dislike bar under YouTube videos.

deslikebutton.description: Show the like & dislike buttons of YouTube for this video.
deslikebutton.message: Zobrazit YouTube tlačítka líbí a nelíbí se mi pro tohle video.

desmousespotlighta.description: If the light is off, show a spotlight around the mouse cursor.
desmousespotlighta.message: Jestliže jsou světla vypnuta, ukaž kolem kurzoru kruh světla

desmousespotlightc.description: If the light is off, you can select an area to focus a item.
desmousespotlightc.message: If the light is off, you can select an area to focus a item.

desmousespotlighto.description: Normal use (disables the mouse settings below)
desmousespotlighto.message: Normal use (disables the mouse settings below)

desmousespotlightt.description: Allows you to click through the darkened screen when the lights are off.
desmousespotlightt.message: Allows you to click through the darkened screen when the lights are off.

despassword.description: Require a password to be entered before turning the lights back on.
despassword.message: Require a password to be entered before turning the lights back on.

desplaylist.description: Show the YouTube playlist on the YouTube website.
desplaylist.message: Zobrazit YouTube playlist na webu YouTube.

desreadera.description: Always show the dimness level bar when the lights go out.
desreadera.message: Vždy zobrazit level bar zatmavení, když světla zhasínají.

desreadern.description: Never show the dimness level bar.

desrememberpage.description: If this option is enabled, it will show you not the remember page.
desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will show you not the remember page.

dessharebutton.description: Show the share buttons of YouTube for this video.
dessharebutton.message: Zobrazit YouTube tlačítka sdílení pro tohle video.

desspotlightradius.description: is the diameter of the search lamp.
desspotlightradius.message: is the diameter of the search lamp.

dessuggestions.description: Show the suggestions of the YouTube website.

destime.description: Lights off between the following times:
destime.message: Lights off between the following times:

desvideoheadline.description: Show and invert the color of the video title.
desvideoheadline.message: Zobrazit a invertovat barvy názvu videa.

desviewcount.description: Show the number of view for this video.

donatepromotext.description: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!
donatepromotext.message: Pokud poskytnete dar v podobě libovolné částky, budu si toho nesmírně vážit!

eastereggsquestion.description: Do you like a real movie theater?

enjoyshare.description: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.
enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

helpautoplay.description: The 'Eye protection' is enabled. To use the below feature, disable the 'Eye protection' option.
helpautoplay.message: "Ochrana očí" je aktivní.  Pro použití funkcí níže vypněte "Ochranu očí".

helpeyeprotection.description: Enabling 'Eye protection' will automatically disable the 'Auto play' feature.
helpeyeprotection.message: Enabling 'Eye protection' will automatically disable the 'Auto play' feature.

lockwrongpassword.message: Nesprávné heslo, zkuste to prosím znovu.

longdonatetext.description: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for the other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!
longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for the other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

shortcutalllights.description: to toggle the lights on/off for all open tabs.
shortcutalllights.message: to toggle the lights on/off for all open tabs.

shortcuteyeprotection.description: to enable/disable the eye protection feature.
shortcuteyeprotection.message: to enable/disable the eye protection feature.

shortcutopacity.description: to restore to the set darkness (opacity) setting.
shortcutopacity.message: to restore to the set darkness (opacity) setting.

showremember.description: doesn't show this remember page again when I open the option page.
showremember.message: doesn't show this remember page again when I open the option page.

skipremember.description: Skip this, and open now the option page
skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the option page

textfoot.message: Tento software je licencován pod CC-GNU GPL. Pro zobrazení kopie této licence přejděte na

titelautowidthyoutube.description: Automatically set the YouTube player to the larger size.
titelautowidthyoutube.message: Automatically set the YouTube player to the larger size.

titelcinemaontop.description: Movie theater mode: it show the 'lights off' layer only on the top of the window.
titelcinemaontop.message: Movie theater mode: it show the 'lights off' layer only on the top of the window.

titeldownloadupgrade.description: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.
titeldownloadupgrade.message: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.

titellikebutton.message: Tlačítka Libí a Nelíbí se mi

titelqualityyoutube.description: Automatically set the quality of YouTube videos.
titelqualityyoutube.message: Automatically set the quality of YouTube videos.

titelsyncbrowser.description: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.
titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

warningtextambilight.description: If it's unable to receive video data because of a site's security rule, then it will show the chosen solid color instead.
warningtextambilight.message: If it's unable to receive video data because of a site's security rule, then it will show the chosen solid color instead.
